meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in gymnastics.
meanings.sent1: The young gymnasts practiced their flips and jumps.
meanings.sent2: The gymnasts performed a perfect routine at the competition.
meanings.sent3: The gymnasts tried to do a handstand on a moving bus!
meanings.sent4: Her agility on the balance beam made her stand out among the gymnasts.
meanings.sent5: The gymnasts' dedication to training was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who participate in gymnastics.
meanings.sent1: The gymnasts cheered for each other during the team event.
meanings.sent2: The gymnasts traveled together to the championship.
meanings.sent3: The gymnasts decided to wear matching leotards for fun.
meanings.sent4: The gymnasts moved in perfect harmony during the synchronized routine.
meanings.sent5: The gymnasium echoed with the laughter of the gymnasts.
